504310.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504310
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 310
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 310
504310.text: Yahya related to me from Malik that he had heard more than one of their men of knowledge say, "There has been no call to prayer or iqama for the id al-Fitr or the id al-Adha since the time of the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace."

504320.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504320
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 320
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 320
504320.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Nafi that Abdullah ibn Umar used to do ghusl on the day of Fitr before going to the place of prayer.

504330.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504330
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 330
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 330
504330.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Ibn Shihab that the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, used to pray on the day of Fitr and the day of Adha before the khutba.

504340.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504340
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 340
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 340
504340.text: Yahya related to me from Malik that he had heard that Abu Bakr and Umar used to do that.

504350.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504350
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 350
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 350
504350.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Ibn Shihab that Abu Ubayd, the mawla of Ibn Azhar said, "I was present at an id with Umar ibn al- Khattab. He prayed, and then after he had prayed he gave a khutba to the people and said, 'The Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, forbade fasting on these two days - the day you break your fast (after Ramadan), and the day you eat from your sacrifice (after Hajj) .' "

504360.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504360
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 360
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 360
504360.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Hisham ibn Urwa from his father that he used to eat on the day of the id al-Fitr before going out.

504370.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504370
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 370
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 370
504370.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Ibn Shihab that Said al- Musayyab told him that people used to be told to eat on the day of Fitr before setting out. Malik said that he did not consider that people had to do that for Adha.

504380.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504380
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 380
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 380
504380.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Damra ibn Said al-Mazini from Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Utba ibn Masud that Umar ibn al-Khattab asked Abu Waqid al-Laythi what the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, used to recite in the prayers of Adha and Fitr. He said, "He used to recite Qaf (Sura 50) and al-lnshiqaq (Sura84)."

504390.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504390
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 390
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 390
504390.text: Yahya related to me from Malik that Nafi, the mawla of Abdullah ibn Umar said, "I was at Adha and Fitr with Abu Hurayra and he said 'Allah is greater' seven times in the first raka, before the recitation, and five times in the second, before the recitation."

504400.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504400
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 400
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 400
504400.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Nafi that Abdullah ibn Umar did not pray either before the prayer or after it on the day of Fitr.

504410.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504410
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 410
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 410
504410.text: Yahya related to me from Malik that he had heard that Said ibn al-Musayyab used to go to the place of prayer after praying subh, and before the sun rose.

504420.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504420
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 420
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 420
504420.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Abd ar-Rahman ibn al-Qasim that his father used to pray four rakas before he went to the place of prayer.

504430.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 504430
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 430
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 430
504430.text: Yahya related to me from Hisham ibn Urwa that his father used to pray on the day of Fitr before the prayer in the mosque.

10014.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 10014
In-book reference  : Book 10, Hadith 014
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 10, Hadith 014
10014.text: Yahya related to me that Malik said, "The sunna concerning the time of prayer on the ids of Fitr and Adha - and there is no disagreement amongst us about it - is that the imam leaves his house and as soon as he has reached the place of prayer the prayer falls due."
